meanings.definition: A shelter for a car consisting of a roof supported by posts.
meanings.sent1: Our carport keeps our vehicle safe from the rain.
meanings.sent2: The carport in our driveway provides shade for our car.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally parked my bike in the carport instead of the garage!
meanings.sent4: The carport stood like a vigilant guardian over the car during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The carport's roof shielded the car from the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: To provide a carport for a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: We decided to carport our new car to protect it from the elements.
meanings.sent2: He will carport his truck to keep it safe from the snow.
meanings.sent3: She loves to carport her vintage car as soon as she gets home.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic will carport the customer's car while working on it.
meanings.sent5: They always carport their motorcycles to prevent any damage.
